Slug Generator

Convert text to URL-friendly slugs. Generate SEO-friendly slugs from any text.

FAQ

What is a slug?

A slug is a URL-friendly version of text, typically used in URLs, filenames, and identifiers. It contains only lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens/underscores.

Is my data sent to a server?

No. All processing happens locally in your browser.
